summary: Generates Meson build system toolchain configuration files by gathering compiler settings, environment variables, platform‑specific flags and default directories, then rendering them through templates into a ready‑to‑use toolchain definition.
business_intent: Enable automatic, Conan‑driven creation of Meson toolchain files so that projects can be built with the correct compiler, linker and runtime options across different platforms and cross‑compilation scenarios without manual configuration.
